description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Lead your orbital battleships to victory in Flotilla!  Discover new planets, battle bounty hunters, and explore the tactical richness of 3D fleet maneuvers.
description.short: Lead your orbital battleships to victory in Flotilla!  Discover new planets, battle bounty hunters, and explore the tactical richness of 3D fleet maneuvers.
